This morning Kirsten Gillibrand was on Morning Joe, and the hosts asked her to talk about Gabrielle Giffords as a person.`` She's the most non-partisan person I've ever met,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. She's the vision of hope for this country right now. She embodies everything that Barack Obama was trying to say, that we have to be better than we are.
